summary: A corporate executive is sent to a small town to re-brand a restaurant as part of a strategic acquisition, but the iconic diner happens to be in her home town where she hasn't been in years and the owner is her high school sweetheart.
cast: Taylor Cole|Andrew W. Walker|Alley Mills|Marcus Rosner|Robert Moloney|Fiona Vroom|Morgan Taylor Campbell|Jenn Griffin|Antonio Cayonne|Kate Crutchlow|Michael Kopsa|Peter Hanlon|Christina Jastrzembska|Ben Wilkinson|Jason Simpson|Garth Hodgson|Cardi Wong|Stefania Indelicato
title: Amor a la carta
